name: In Orbit (itch) (OptimusDu)
description:
In Orbit is a screensaver for your computer or game console. The application simulates a starship orbiting high above a glowing planet accompanied by a tranquil music track. You can pause and restart the music, rotate the ship, and change the ship's appearance.

In Orbit runs on Windows, Linux, and other computers; but it was designed as an application for RetroArch game consoles.

For reference, the keyboard controls are Q, E, A, S, D, Tab, and Enter
